response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering its worth to us, we propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional item. We believe this price reflects its true value while providing you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14000}
